subsection_content:
Adult roundworms moving abnormally in the body will cause damage to the organs they pass through such as: appendicitis, acute pancreatitis due to the worms entering the Wirsung duct, entering the common bile duct causing bile obstruction, inflammation of the gallbladder. bile, creating gallstones, and worms crawling into the liver, causing liver abscesses.
Roundworms also cause intestinal obstruction, intestinal perforation, peritonitis, and secrete toxins that cause convulsions, epilepsy, meningitis, etc.
subsection_title: benh giun dua.json. Complications of ascariasis
subsection_data:
benh giun dua.json. Complications of ascariasis
Adult roundworms moving abnormally in the body will cause damage to the organs they pass through such as: appendicitis, acute pancreatitis due to the worms entering the Wirsung duct, entering the common bile duct causing bile obstruction, inflammation of the gallbladder. bile, creating gallstones, and worms crawling into the liver, causing liver abscesses.
Roundworms also cause intestinal obstruction, intestinal perforation, peritonitis, and secrete toxins that cause convulsions, epilepsy, meningitis, etc.
